vote.title: Authorize (1) acceptance of a grant with PolicyLink in the amount of $50,000.00 (Contract No. MGT-2020-00014737) to assess or analyze the City of Dallas’ fines, fees, and related collections practices, unless the City of Dallas has already conducted such an assessment of analysis for the period from June 1, 2020 to July 31, 2021; (2) participation in the Cities and Counties Fines and Fees Justice Cohort; (3) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the Cities and Counties Fine and Fee Justice Fund; (4) establishment of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $50,000.00 in the Cities and Counties Fine and Fee Justice Fund; (5) advancement or development of an actionable plan of at least three fine or fee reforms; (6) sharing of the City of Dallas’ lessons learned with other localities interested in reforming fines and fees; (7) participation in an evaluation of Cities and Counties for Fine and Fee Justice; and (8) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the agreement  - Not to exceed $50,000.00 - Financing: PolicyLink with Cities and Counties Fine and Fees Justice Cohort Grant Funds
